text:
The text too small to read for us was the <small> element so I removed it and updated the font-size to 1.2rem which seemed to fix that one

viewport not set, not come across this one I am afraid and we use the following meta so perhaps could check yours is similarly laid out :man-shrugging:
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">

Clickable elements too close together:
Can be anything from inline hyperlinks to buttons. It is a pain in the butt when it comes up. I added extra padding / margin around the various hyperlinks to try and fix this one, still waiting for results.

Not a particularly clear cut way to fix them but hopefully can provide some help :slightly_smiling_face:
